name: Carrier
description:
With 'Striker' and 'Ammo Case' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Alloy Plate
components.description:
Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
Locations: Venus, Phobos, Ceres, Jupiter, Pluto, and Sedna.

name: Carrier Prime
description: This ornate sentinel is an excellent example of late Orokin craftsmanship and styling.

name: Dethcube
description:
With 'Swift Deth' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.description:

name: Diriga
description:
Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Alloy Plate
components.description:
Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
Locations: Venus, Phobos, Ceres, Jupiter, Pluto, and Sedna.

components.name: Argon Crystal
components.description:
A Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the Void.
This resource can be found in the Void.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description:

components.name: Plastids
components.description:
A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.
Locations: Phobos, Saturn, Uranus, Pluto, and Eris.

components.name: Polymer Bundle
components.description:
A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.
Locations: Mercury, Venus, and Uranus.

name: Djinn
description:
With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description:
With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.description:

components.name: Forma
components.description: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Companions or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Companions and Weapons.

components.name: Mutagen Mass
components.description: This living mass can produce weaponized toxins for weaponry.

components.name: Salvage
components.description:
High value metals collected from war salvage.
Locations: Mars, Jupiter, and Sedna.

name: Helios
description:
With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description:
With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Ferrite
components.description:
Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.

components.name: Fieldron
components.description: ClanTech weaponized containment field to contain super-heated substances.

components.name: Oxium
components.description:
Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin, used in certain Corpus Robotics.
Locations: Venus, Jupiter, Mars, Neptune, Pluto, Eris, Europa, and Lua.

name: Helios Prime
description: This knowledge hungry protector defends its master with Deconstructor Prime.

name: Shade
description:
With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.
Note: This item requires two open slots.
